attributes.action: Establish a public enquiry into the events leading up to the death of Baby P and set out lessons to be learned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the Prime Minister orders his Children's Minister to establish a full public enquiry into the complete failure of Haringey Council's Children's Services and other relevant agencies to adequately protect and take Baby P into care before his avoidable death. Furthermore, that the public enquiry set out follow-up actions and recommendations going forward, so that Haringey Council and associated bodies not be allowed to oversee the death of a third child through it's total incompetence and bureacratic barriers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
